related-article.article-title: Influenza vaccine coverage, awareness, and beliefs regarding seasonal influenza vaccination among people aged 65 years and older in Central Saudi Arabia

body.p: In manuscript “Influenza vaccine coverage, awareness, and beliefs regarding seasonal influenza vaccination among people aged 65 years and older in Central Saudi Arabia” Saudi Med J 2019; Vol. 40 (10): 1013-1018. doi: 10.15537/smj.2019.11.24587. The affiliation should have appeared as: From the College of Medicine (Alotaibi, Alhetheel, Alluhaymid, Alshibani, Almuhaydili, Alhuqay, Alfayez, Almasasbi), King Saud University, and from the Department of Microbiology & Pathology (Alhetheel), King Khalid University Hospital, Riyadh, Kingdom of Saudi Arabia
